parameters.jsCode:
// Generate partner invoice PDF content const invoice = $json; const header = invoice.invoiceHeader; const summary = invoice.invoiceSummary; const events = invoice.eventBreakdown; // Create HTML invoice template const htmlInvoice = ` Partner Invoice - ${header.invoiceId}

PARTNER INVOICE

Stand Up Sydney

Comedy Event Management & Ticketing

From: Stand Up Sydney
Email: admin@standupsydney.com
Website: standupsydney.com

Invoice To:
${header.partnerName}
${header.partnerEmail}

Invoice #: ${header.invoiceId}
Date: ${new Date(header.invoiceDate).toLocaleDateString()}
Due Date: ${new Date(header.dueDate).toLocaleDateString()}

Invoice Summary

DescriptionAmount (${header.currency})
Total Events${summary.totalEvents}
Total Orders${summary.totalOrders}
Total Revenue$${summary.totalRevenue.toFixed(2)}
Total Fees$${summary.totalFees.toFixed(2)}
Total Discounts$${summary.totalDiscounts.toFixed(2)}
Total Refunds$${summary.totalRefunds.toFixed(2)}
Partner Share (${summary.partnerSharePercentage}%)$${summary.partnerPayoutAmount.toFixed(2)}

Event Breakdown

${events.map(event => `
${event.eventName} - ${new Date(event.eventDate).toLocaleDateString()}

Venue: ${event.venue} | Orders: ${event.eventSummary.totalOrders} | Revenue: $${event.eventSummary.totalRevenue.toFixed(2)} | Partner Share: $${event.eventSummary.totalPartnerShare.toFixed(2)}

${event.orderDetails.map(order => ` `).join('')}
Order ID Customer Email Total Partner Share Status Date
${order.orderName} ${order.customerName} ${order.customerEmail} $${order.orderTotal.toFixed(2)} $${order.partnerShare.toFixed(2)} ${order.status} ${new Date(order.purchaseDate).toLocaleDateString()}
`).join('')}

Payment Instructions

Payment Method: ${invoice.paymentInstructions.paymentMethod}

Account Details:
Account Name: ${invoice.paymentInstructions.accountDetails.accountName}
BSB: ${invoice.paymentInstructions.accountDetails.bsb}
Account Number: ${invoice.paymentInstructions.accountDetails.accountNumber}
Reference: ${invoice.paymentInstructions.accountDetails.reference}

Payment Due: ${new Date(invoice.paymentInstructions.paymentDueDate).toLocaleDateString()}

Generated on ${new Date(invoice.invoiceFooter.generatedAt).toLocaleString()}
${invoice.invoiceFooter.notes}

`; return [{ json: { htmlInvoice, invoiceId: header.invoiceId } }];
